::SnowCat::

She was leaking out most of her mech fluid and had too much damage to 
be repaired in time. She kept her jaw locked around Striker's leg. 
he's have to cut her head off and surgically remove her jaws off 
him.  She knew she was dyinig. She could feel her body and spark 
giving out. She left one message to Ramulus thought the internal 
computer links,"Till all are one."  She then closed her eyes and 
waited for the final blows to come. She found it strange though, she 
could no longer feel the pain or her body, but she could taste the 
mech fluid in her mouth. She held on, hoping it would be over soon.
